titles.title: A resolution recognizing the 10th Anniversary of the National Book Festival.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 9/16/2010--Passed Senate without amendment. Recognizes and emphasizes the important historic and ongoing role of the National Book Festival and encourages the celebration of "A Decade of Words and Wonder" on Saturday, September 25, 2010.
